channel.title: CoReACTER
channel.description: Organization website for the Community of Researchers Assessing Chemical Transformations and Exploring Reactivity (CoReACTER)

item.title: CoReACTER Philosophy
item.description: A description of the core principles guiding the work of the CoReACTER, and a brief overview of our broader philosophies. Note that our ideas and methods are evolving, and so this document should be considered a snapshot, rather than a static ideology.

atom:author.atom:name: The CoReACTER; Evan Walter Clark Spotte-Smith
